hint: Active: Blink Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
blink.notes:
Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
blink.lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

hint: Active: Overwhelming Blink Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.After teleportation, all enemies in a 800 AoE have 50% movement speed slow and 50 attack speed slow for 6 seconds, and take damage equal to 100 + 150% of your strength. Overwhelming Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
overwhelming_blink.notes:
Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Overwhelming Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
overwhelming_blink.lore: A horrifying dagger forged in the chaos maw and nigh untouchable by mortal hands.

hint: Active: Swift Blink Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.After teleportation, you gain %bonus_movement%%% phased movement speed and +%bonus_agi_active% Agility for %duration% seconds. Swift Blink cannot be used for %blink_damage_cooldown% seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
swift_blink.notes:
Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Swift Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
swift_blink.lore: A cunning blade able to anticipate and enable its bearer's movements.

hint: Active: Arcane Blink Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.After teleportation, you gain %manacost_reduction%%% Mana Cost Reduction, %debuff_amp%%% Debuff Amplification and %cast_pct_improvement%%% Cast Point reduction for %duration% seconds. Arcane Blink cannot be used for %blink_damage_cooldown% seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
arcane_blink.notes:
Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Arcane Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
arcane_blink.lore: A revitalizing tool to help bear the weight of arcane expenditure.

blades_of_attack.lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

broadsword.lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

chainmail.lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

claymore.lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

helm_of_iron_will.lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

hint: Passive: PierceGrants each attack a 30% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.
javelin.lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

mithril_hammer.lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

platemail.lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

quarterstaff.lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

hint: Active: Chop Tree Destroy a target tree. Cast Range: 350
Passive: Quell Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 8 for melee heroes, and 4 for ranged.
quelling_blade.notes: Effects of multiple quelling blades do not stack.
quelling_blade.lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

hint: Use: Imbue Instantly restores 85 health.
faerie_fire.lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

hint: Passive: Magical Damage Block Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 75 damage. Comes with 6 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.
infused_raindrop.notes: Uses at most one charge per damage instance.

hint: Bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.
wind_lace.lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.

ring_of_protection.lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

hint: Passive: Damage BlockGrants a 50% chance to block 20 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 8 damage on ranged.
stout_shield.notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
stout_shield.lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.

hint: Use: Consume Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed and 200 bonus night vision. Max 1 use.
Passive: Shade SightGrants 400 bonus night vision.
moon_shard.lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

gauntlets.lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

slippers.lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

mantle.lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

hint: Use: Plant Tree Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.Range: 400
branches.lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

belt_of_strength.lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

boots_of_elves.lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

robe.lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

circlet.lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

crown.lore: A stately crown created to ensure a well-meaning but ungifted heir could fend off usurpers and govern with a strong hand.

ogre_axe.lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

blade_of_alacrity.lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

staff_of_wizardry.lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

ultimate_orb.lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

gloves.lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

blitz_knuckles.lore: An underground arcanist's update of a back-alley classic.

hint: Passive: LifestealHeals the attacker for 15% of attack damage dealt.
lifesteal.lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

hint: Passive: Spell Lifesteal10% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.  Lifesteal reduced to 2% against creeps.
voodoo_mask.lore: A mask tuned to sip the arcane bindings that pass between caster and foe.

ring_of_regen.lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

ring_of_tarrasque.lore: An ageless ring forged with an otherwise simple blood magic amplified by the presumed source of its key component.

sobi_mask.lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

hint: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Active: Reveal Gives True Sight over a %active_radius% radius revealing wards and units even in Fog of War.
Passive: True Sight Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within %radius% range of its carrier.
Passive: EverlastingDropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
gem.lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

cloak.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
cloak.lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

talisman_of_evasion.notes: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
talisman_of_evasion.lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

hint: Use: Fondue Instantly restores 2500 health and 1500 mana.
cheese.lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.

hint: Active: Energy Charge Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. Max 10 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.
magic_stick.notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
magic_stick.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

hint: Active: Energy ChargeInstantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. Max 20 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.
magic_wand.notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
magic_wand.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

hint: Active: Ghost Form You enter ghost form for 4 seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage.
ghost.notes:
Ends if you become Spell Immune, and will have no effect if you are already Spell Immune.
Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.
ghost.lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

hint: Use: Replenish Grants 6 mana regeneration to the target for 25 seconds.If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.Range: 250
clarity.lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

hint: Use: Eat Mango Instantly restores 100 mana.Range: 400
enchanted_mango.notes: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.
enchanted_mango.lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

hint: Use: Salve Grants 30 health regeneration to the target for 13 seconds.If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.Range: 250
flask.lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

hint: Use: RevealReveals and slows invisible heroes by %movespeed%%% in a %radius% radius around the caster for %duration% seconds. Invisible units revealed by dust take %damage% damage.
dust.notes: Places a debuff on enemy units in the area that reveals them when they are invisible.
dust.lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.

hint: Active: RegenerateConsumes a charge to restore 110 health and 60 mana over 2.7 seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.Hold Control to use on an allied hero.Range: 350
Passive:  Store RuneRunes can be stored in the bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 90 seconds.Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.
bottle.notes: Bottle is shareable. Stored runes cannot be shared.
bottle.lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

hint: Use: PlantPlants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a %vision_range_tooltip% radius to your team. Lasts %duration_minutes_tooltip% minutes.Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.Range: %abilitycastrange%
ward_observer.lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

hint: Use: Plant Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a %true_sight_range% radius.Lasts %duration_minutes_tooltip% minutes.Does not grant ground vision.Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero. Range: %abilitycastrange%
ward_sentry.lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

hint: Use: Plant Plant the currently active ward.  Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.Range: %abilitycastrange%
ward_dispenser.notes: Hold Control to give one ward to an allied hero.
ward_dispenser.lore: Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.

hint: Use: Devour Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.Comes with 3 charges.  Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.Tree Range: 165
tango.lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

hint: Use: Devour Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.Tree Range: 165
Use: Deploy Courier Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
courier.lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

hint: Use: Upgrade CourierUpgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base. Requires a deployed Animal Courier.
flying_courier.lore: The faithful mount upon which soar the fortunes of battle.

hint: Use: TeleportAfter channeling for 3 seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
tpscroll.notes:
If multiple heroes teleport to the same location in succession, the channeling time will be increased for each successive hero.
Teleport can be prevented or canceled by Root abilities.

hint: Upgrade: Town Portal ScrollUpgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Upgrade: Town Portal ScrollUpgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units and heroes, reduces cooldown, channel time and does not consume a charge on usage.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Active: Phase Gives 20% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 10% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for 3 seconds.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
phase_boots.lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

demon_edge.lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

eagle.lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

reaver.lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

relic.lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

hyperstone.lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

ring_of_health.lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

void_stone.lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

mystic_staff.lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

energy_booster.lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

point_booster.lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

vitality_booster.lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

fluffy_hat.lore: Fine and functional foppery for the fashion-forward fighter.

hint: Active: Switch AttributeSwitches between +10 Strength, +10 Agility, or +10 Intelligence.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
power_treads.notes: Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi.
power_treads.lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

hint: Active: Transmute Kills a non-hero target for 160 gold and 2.1x experience.  Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.Range: 600
hand_of_midas.notes:
The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).
Experience gained by using Transmute is not shared.
hand_of_midas.lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

oblivion_staff.lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary staff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

hint: Passive: Witch BladeCauses your next attack to apply a poison for 4 seconds, slowing by 25% and dealing 0.75x your intelligence as damage every second. This attack has True Strike.
witch_blade.lore: A spiteful blade inadvertently possessed by the soul of its incautious creator.

pers.lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

hint: Passive: Damage BlockGives a 100% chance to block 30 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 20 damage on ranged.Has a 50% chance to block damage from creeps.
poor_mans_shield.notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
poor_mans_shield.lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.

hint: Increases XP that you earn by 15%.
Doubles its bonuses after minute %clock_time%.
bracer.lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

hint: Doubles its bonuses after minute %clock_time%.
wraith_band.lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

hint: Doubles its bonuses after minute %clock_time%.
null_talisman.lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

hint: Active: RestoreHeals 275 health to allied units in a 1200 radius.
Passive: Mekansm AuraGrants 2.5 health regeneration to allied units in a 1200 radius.
mekansm.notes:
Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore in the last 25 seconds.
Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
mekansm.lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

hint: Passive: Vladmir's AuraGrants 15% lifesteal, 18% bonus damage, 1.75 mana regeneration, and 3 armor to nearby allies. Radius: 1200
vladmir.lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

hint: Active: Wraith's ReprisalSummons a movable totem in your location for %abilityduration% seconds that reduces all damage of enemies within %aura_radius% radius by %damage_penalty_aura%%% and deals %aura_dps% damage per second. Totem can be destroyed in 5 hits. Creeps deal half damage to the totem.
Passive: Vladmir's AuraGrants %lifesteal_aura%%% lifesteal, %damage_aura%%% bonus damage, %mana_regen_aura% mana regeneration, and %armor_aura% armor to nearby allies. Radius: %aura_radius%
wraith_pact.lore: A sentient amulet whose animus shakes the courage of even the strongest foes.

hint: Passive: Buckler Aura Grants 2 armor to allied player units.Radius: 1200
buckler.lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

hint: Passive: Basilius AuraGrants 1 mana regeneration to allies.  Radius: 1200
ring_of_basilius.lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

hint: Active: Energy ChargeTarget an allied unit to instantly restore %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored. Max %max_charges% charges. Automatically gains a charge every %charge_gain_timer% seconds and whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability.
Passive: Holy BlessingAmplifies heals you provide by %heal_increase%%%.
Passive: Regeneration AuraGrants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration to allies.Radius: %aura_radius%
holy_locket.lore: A prized relic long thought lost forever in a failed crusade.

hint: Active: BarrierGives a shield that blocks 400 magic damage to all nearby allies. Lasts 12 seconds.Radius: 1200
Passive: Insight Aura Gives allied units 2.5 health regeneration and 12% magic resistance.Radius: 1200
pipe.notes:
Multiple instances of Barrier do not stack.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance.
pipe.lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

hint: Active: Soul Release Provides 30 health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals 25 damage per second when cast on enemies. Lasts 8 seconds.  Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units.  Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.Cast Range: 950
urn_of_shadows.notes:
Empty urns gain 2 charges.
If used on a hero with Soul Release already active on them, it will refresh its duration.
urn_of_shadows.lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

hint: Passive: Regeneration AuraGrants 2 health regeneration to allies.Radius: 1200
headdress.lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

hint: Active: HexTurns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.Instantly destroys illusions.Range: 800
sheepstick.notes: The target will have a base movement speed of %sheep_movement_speed%, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
sheepstick.lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

hint: Active: Soul BurnSilences the target unit for %silence_duration% seconds. At the end of the silence, %silence_damage_percent%%% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.Range: %abilitycastrange%
orchid.lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

hint: Active: Soul Rend Silences a target for %silence_duration% seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional %silence_damage_percent%%% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage.All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and %tooltip_crit_chance%%% chance to crit for %target_crit_multiplier%%% damage.Range: %abilitycastrange%
Passive: Mage SlayerPlaces a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do %spell_amp_debuff%%% less spell damage for %duration% seconds.
bloodthorn.lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

hint: Passive: Echo Strike Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 100% movement slow for 0.8 seconds on each strike.
echo_sabre.lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

hint: Active: Cyclone Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.Range: 550Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
cyclone.notes:
You cannot cyclone allies.
Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.
Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
cyclone.lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

hint: Active: Cyclone Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself, enemy units or allied units.Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.Range: 550Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
wind_waker.notes:
Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
When cast on yourself, the cyclone can be moved anywhere at a speed of 360.
wind_waker.lore: Proof enough to some that unseen forces manipulate the happenings of the material plane.

hint: Passive: Aethereal Focus Increases targeted spell and item cast range by 225.
aether_lens.lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

hint: Active: ForcePushes any target unit %push_length% units in the direction it is facing.Range: %abilitycastrange%
force_staff.notes:
Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.
Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
force_staff.lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

hint: Active: Hurricane Thrust Pushes you and target enemy %enemy_length% units away from each other, and for %range_duration% seconds, allows you to make %max_attacks% attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +%bonus_attack_speed% attack speed.Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.Allied Range: %abilitycastrange%Enemy Range: %cast_range_enemy%
Passive:  Dragon's Reach Increases attack range of ranged heroes by %base_attack_range%.
hurricane_pike.notes:
Self-cast will use Hurricane Pike on yourself.
Hurricane Pike doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
hurricane_pike.lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

hint: Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.Damage: 400,500,600,700,800Range: 700,750,800,850,900Mana Cost: 120,140,160,180,200
dagon.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

hint: Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.Damage: 400,500,600,700,800Range: 700,750,800,850,900Mana Cost: 120,140,160,180,200
dagon_2.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

hint: Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.Damage: 400,500,600,700,800Range: 700,750,800,850,900Mana Cost: 120,140,160,180,200
dagon_3.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

hint: Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.Damage: 400,500,600,700,800Range: 700,750,800,850,900Mana Cost: 120,140,160,180,200
dagon_4.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

hint: Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.Damage: 400,500,600,700,800Range: 700,750,800,850,900Mana Cost: 120,140,160,180,200
dagon_5.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

hint: Active: Demonic SummoningSummons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 60 seconds.Warrior:Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it.  Gains True Sight at level 3.Health: 800,1200,1600Damage: 25,45,65Mana Break Damage: 30,40,50Last Will Damage: 600,700,800Archer:Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.Health: 800,1200,1600Damage: 37,57,75Aura Move Speed: 5,7,9Aura Radius: 1200
necronomicon.lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

hint: Active: Demonic SummoningSummons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 60 seconds.Warrior:Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it.  Gains True Sight at level 3.Health: 800,1200,1600Damage: 25,45,65Mana Break Damage: 30,40,50Last Will Damage: 600,700,800Archer:Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.Health: 800,1200,1600Damage: 37,57,75Aura Move Speed: 5,7,9Aura Radius: 1200
necronomicon_2.lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

Gains True Sight at level 3.Health: 800,1200,1600Damage: 25,45,65Mana Break Damage: 30,40,50Last Will Damage: 600,700,800Archer:Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.Health: 800,1200,1600Damage: 37,57,75Aura Move Speed: 5,7,9Aura Radius: 1200
necronomicon_3.lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

hint: Passive: Ability UpgradeUpgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.
ultimate_scepter.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

hint: Passive: Ability UpgradeUpgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.
ultimate_scepter_2.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

hint: Passive: Ability UpgradeUpgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.
ultimate_scepter_roshan.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

hint: Passive: Ability UpgradeUpgrades an existing ability or adds a new ability to your hero.
aghanims_shard.lore: With origins known only to a single wizard, fragments of this impossible crystal are nearly as coveted as the renowned scepter itself.

hint: Passive: Ability UpgradeUpgrades an existing ability or adds a new ability to your hero..
aghanims_shard_roshan.lore: With origins known only to a single wizard, fragments of this impossible crystal are nearly as coveted as the renowned scepter itself.

hint: Active: Reset CooldownsResets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
refresher.lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

hint: Passive: Assault Aura Grants 30 attack speed and 5 armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by -5.Radius: 1200
assault.lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

heart.lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

hint: Active: Avatar Grants Spell Immunity.  Duration decreases with each use. Duration: 9,8,7,6 Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
black_king_bar.notes:
Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.
Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
black_king_bar.lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

hint: Passive: Reincarnation Brings you to life with full health and mana 5 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
aegis.lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

hint: Active: Arctic Blast Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4 seconds.Radius: 900
Passive: Freezing Aura Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by -45 and all heals, regeneration and lifesteal by 25%. Radius: 1200
shivas_guard.notes:
The wave extends at a speed of %blast_speed% to a max size of %blast_radius%.
The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
shivas_guard.lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

hint: Active: Bloodpact Doubles Bloodstone's Spell Lifesteal and also converts the same percentage of damage dealt to mana. Lasts %buff_duration% seconds. Costs %hp_cost%%% of your current HP to activate
bloodstone.notes: Using Bloodpact leaves you drained for 40 seconds and can't benefit from Bloodpact again during that time.
bloodstone.lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

hint: Passive: SpellblockBlocks most targeted spells once every 12 seconds.
Active: Transfer SpellblockTemporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for 12 seconds.Range: 700
sphere.lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

hint: Active: Echo ShellApplies a shield to the target unit for 6 seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster.The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell. Range: 900Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
lotus_orb.lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

hint: Active: Meteor Hammer CHANNELED - After a successful channel, summons a meteor that strikes a %impact_radius% AoE, stunning enemies for %stun_duration% seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage over time to enemies units and buildings for %burn_duration% seconds.Building Impact Damage: %impact_damage_buildings% Building Over Time Damage: %burn_dps_buildings% Non-Building Impact Damage: %impact_damage_units% Non-Building Over Time Damage: %burn_dps_units% Channel Duration: %max_duration% seconds.Landing Time: %land_time% seconds.
Active: Nullify Dispels the target and applies a debuff for 5 seconds. Continuously dispels the target.Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

Passive: Combo Breaker When you take damage and your health falls below 70%, a strong dispel is applied and you gain a 2.5 second buff that provides +75% Status Resistance and causes all damage you deal and are dealt to be reduced to zero. Only triggers on player based damage. Cooldown increases every time it triggers.Dispel Type: Strong Dispel
Combines Sange, Yasha and Kaya together.
Use: Reset CooldownsResets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

Active: Soul Release When used against enemies, it reduces health by 4% of current health per second, and reduces HP regeneration, healing, lifesteal and spell lifesteal by 45%. Deals 35 damage per second. When used on allies, it provides 40 health regeneration per second. Lasts 8 seconds.  Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units.  Only the closest Spirit Vessel to the dying hero will gain a charge.Cast Range: 950
Passive: Damage Block Grants a 60% chance to block 64 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 32 damage on ranged.
vanguard.notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
vanguard.lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

hint: Active: Guard For %duration% seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings a %block_chance_active%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee_active% damage from each incoming attack.Units may only be affected by Guard once every %tooltip_reapply_time% seconds.Radius: %bonus_aoe_radius%
Passive: Damage Block Grants a %block_chance%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %block_damage_ranged% damage on ranged.
crimson_guard.notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
crimson_guard.lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

hint: Active: Damage ReturnFor 4.5 seconds, the damage returned from all sources is increased by 80%.
Passive: Damage ReturnEverytime you are attacked, you return 20 damage plus 20% of the attack damage dealt to you.
blade_mail.notes:
Damage Return is calculated before any kind of reduction.
Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other forms of Blade Mail.
Returned damage type is the same as it was received.
blade_mail.lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

hint: Active: Barrier Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to %barrier_block% magical damage.  Lasts %barrier_duration% seconds.
hood_of_defiance.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
hood_of_defiance.lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

hint: Active: Shroud Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 400 magical damage, converting damage taken into mana.  Lasts 12 seconds.
eternal_shroud.lore: A pristine hood that feeds upon strife to empower its owner.

hint: Passive: Everlasting Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed. Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
rapier.notes: If Divine Rapier is dropped and picked up by an enemy of its original owner, it cannot be dropped again except by death.
rapier.lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

hint: Passive: PierceGrants each attack a 80% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.
monkey_king_bar.lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

hint: Toggle: Burn When active, scorches enemies for %aura_damage% magical damage per second and causes them to miss %blind_pct%%% of their attacks. Illusions deal %aura_damage_illusions% magical damage per second.Radius: %aura_radius%
radiance.lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

butterfly.notes: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
butterfly.lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

hint: Passive: Critical StrikeGrants each attack a 30% chance to deal 225% damage.
greater_crit.notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
greater_crit.lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

hint: Passive: Bash Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.5 seconds and deal 100 bonus physical damage.  Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.
basher.notes:
Does not stack with other sources of Bash.
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, and Slardar.
basher.lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

hint: Active: Chop Tree Destroy a target tree.Cast Range: 350
Passive: Quell Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 15 for melee heroes, and 6 for ranged.
Passive: Cleave Deals 70% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to 650 around the target. Deals 40% against creeps. (Melee Only)
bfury.notes:
Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
If multiple sources of Cleave are present, each Cleave's damage is applied separately.
bfury.lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

hint: Active: Mirror ImageCreates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee images deal 33% damage, while Ranged images deal 28%. Illusions take 300% damage. Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
manta.notes:
Has a %invuln_duration% second cast time during which you are invulnerable.
Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
Yasha based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
manta.lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

hint: Passive: Critical StrikeGrants each attack a 30% chance to deal 160% damage.
lesser_crit.notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
lesser_crit.lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

hint: Passive: Dragon's Reach Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.
dragon_lance.lore: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.

hint: Toggle: Unholy StrengthWhen active, Unholy Strength grants +%unholy_bonus_damage% damage, +%unholy_bonus_strength% strength and +%unholy_bonus_armor% armor, but drains %unholy_health_drain_per_second% health per second. You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
armlet.notes:
The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change.
The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds.
Activating or deactivating Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling.
armlet.lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

hint: Active: Shadow WalkMakes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units.  If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus physical damage on that attack.
invis_sword.notes:
Has a %windwalk_fade_time% second fade time.
If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.
invis_sword.lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

hint: Active: Shadow WalkMakes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While invisible, you move 25% faster and can move through units.  Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 175 bonus physical damage and a guaranteed 160% critical strike to the target, and disable their passive abilities for 4 seconds.
Passive: Critical StrikeGrants each attack a 30% chance to deal 160% damage.
silver_edge.lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

sange_and_yasha.notes: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
sange_and_yasha.lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

kaya_and_sange.lore: Two of three known items of unimaginable power that many believe were crafted at the same enchanter's forge.

yasha_and_kaya.lore: Yasha and Kaya when paired together share a natural resonance.

hint: Active: Unholy RageIncreases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 6 seconds. Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Passive: LifestealHeals the attacker for 25% of attack damage dealt.
satanic.lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

hint: Active: Static ChargePlaces a charged shield on a target unit for 15 seconds which has a 20% chance to release a 225 magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.Range: 800

Passive: Chain LightningGrants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 12 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 180 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
mjollnir.notes:
Static Charge cannot trigger more than once per second.
Static Charge's shock deals magical damage centered on hero with the Static Charge. Static Charge's targets cannot be more than %static_seconary_radius% range away.
Static Charge procs will not bounce to heroes that are invisible or hidden by Fog of War.
mjollnir.lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

hint: Passive: Cold Attack Attacks lower enemy movement and attack speed and reduces heals, health regeneration, lifesteal and spell lifesteal by %heal_reduction%%% for %cold_duration% seconds. Slows enemy ranged units by %cold_slow_ranged%%% movement speed and by %cold_slow_ranged% attack speed. Slows enemy melee units by %cold_slow_melee%%% movement speed and by %cold_slow_melee% attack speed.
skadi.lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

sange.lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

hint: Active: DominateTakes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 380 and max health to a minimum of 1000. Also provides the unit with +25 base attack damage, +12 health regen, +4 mana regen and +4 armor. Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1000 retain their original max health.  Dominated unit's bounty is set to 100 gold.Range: 700
helm_of_the_dominator.notes:
Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time.  If a new unit is dominated, the old one will die.
Can also Dominate enemy lane creeps and summoned units.
Selling Helm of the Dominator will cause dominated units to die.
helm_of_the_dominator.lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

hint: Active: DominateTakes control of one neutral target unit and sets its movement speed to 400 and max health to a minimum of 1800. Also provides the unit with +80 base attack damage, +12 health regen, +4 mana regen and +8 armor. Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1800 retain their original max health.  Dominated unit's bounty is set to 250 gold.Range: 700
Passive: Vladmir's AuraGrants 15% lifesteal, 18% bonus damage, 1.75 mana regeneration, and 3 armor to nearby allies.
helm_of_the_overlord.notes:
Can dominate up to two at a time. 
Can also Dominate enemy lane creeps and summoned units.
Selling will cause dominated units to die.
helm_of_the_overlord.lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

hint: Passive: Chain LightningGrants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 140 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
maelstrom.lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

hint: Active: Eternal ChainsRoots all enemies in a target 450 radius for 2 seconds and deals 220 damage.Range: 1100

Passive: Chain LightningGrants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 160 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
gungir.lore: Bindings forged by impossible means to leash an ancient evil.

hint: Passive: Corruption Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %corruption_duration% seconds.
Passive: Soul Stealer Desolator gains +%bonus_damage_per_kill% damage per hero kill and +%bonus_damage_per_assist% damage per assist while equipped up to a maximum of %max_damage%.
desolator.lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

yasha.notes: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
yasha.lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

hint: Active: BerserkGives 110 attack speed and 30 movement speed, but reduces your armor by 8 and silences you.  Lasts 6 seconds.
Passive: LifestealHeals the attacker for 20% of attack damage dealt.
mask_of_madness.lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

hint: Active: Inhibit Targets an enemy, slowing it for %purge_slow_duration% seconds.Range: %abilitycastrange%

Passive: ManabreakEach attack burns %feedback_mana_burn% mana from the target, and deals %damage_per_burn% physical damage per burned mana. Burns %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_melee% mana per attack from melee illusions and %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_ranged% mana per attack from ranged illusions.
diffusal_blade.notes: Does not stack with other diffusal blades.
diffusal_blade.lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

hint: Active: Ether BlastConverts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and %ethereal_damage_bonus%%% more vulnerable to magic damage.  Enemy targets are also slowed by %blast_movement_slow%%%, and take %blast_agility_multiplier%x your target's primary attribute + %blast_damage_base% as magical damage.Range: %abilitycastrange%Duration: %duration% seconds
ethereal_blade.notes:
Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter.
Ethereal units take %ethereal_damage_bonus%%% bonus magic damage.
ethereal_blade.lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

hint: Active: Sacrifice Consume %health_sacrifice% health to temporarily gain %mana_gain% mana.  Lasts %duration% seconds.If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.
soul_ring.notes: If this mana is not used before the duration ends, the extra mana is lost.
soul_ring.lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

hint: Active: Replenish ManaRestores 175 mana to all nearby allies.Radius: 1200
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
arcane_boots.notes: Does not work on Meepo clones.
arcane_boots.lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

hint: Passive: Cooldown ReductionReduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.
octarine_core.lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

hint: Passive: Poison AttackPoisons the target, dealing 2 magical damage per second and slowing movement by -13% if the equipped hero is melee, or by -4% if they are ranged. Lasts for 2 seconds.
orb_of_venom.notes: Does not stack with its upgrades.
orb_of_venom.lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

hint: Passive: Lesser Corruption Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -2 for 8 seconds.
blight_stone.notes: Does not stack with its upgrades.
blight_stone.lore: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

hint: Passive: CorrosionDealing 3 damage per second, reducing armor by 3, and slowing movement by 13% if the equipped hero is melee, or by 4% if they are ranged.Lasts for 3 seconds.
orb_of_corrosion.lore: Seepage from the wounds of a warrior deity, sealed in an arcanist's orb following a campaign of vicious slaughter.

falcon_blade.lore: An enchanted blade that long ago raised a hopeless urchin from pauper to king.

hint: Passive: Mage SlayerPlaces a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do %spell_amp_debuff%%% less spell damage for %duration% seconds.
mage_slayer.lore: Forged by a secret order in The Third Age of Praxa'cia to fell the False King.

hint: Active: Endurance Consumes a charge and gives +45 attack speedand +13% movement speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds. Comes with 8 charges.Radius: 1200
Passive: Swiftness AuraGrants 20 movement speed to allies.  Radius: 1200
ancient_janggo.lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

hint: Active: Endurance Consumes a charge and gives +%bonus_attack_speed_pct% attack speed, +%bonus_movement_speed_pct%%% Movement Speed to nearby allies for %duration% seconds For the first 2 seconds allies are immune to slows.Starts with 8 Charges. Gains 1 Charge every 3 minutes. Radius: %radius%
Passive: Swiftness AuraGrants %aura_movement_speed% movement speed to allies.  Radius: %radius%
boots_of_bearing.lore: Resplendent footwear fashioned for the ancient herald that first dared spread the glory of Stonehall beyond the original borders of its nascent claim.

hint: Active: Valor If cast on an ally, grants them the 5 armor, and removing it from the caster. If cast on an enemy, reduces 5 armor on both the enemy and the caster. Cannot target spell immune enemies.Range: 1000
medallion_of_courage.lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

hint: Active: ShineWhen cast on an ally, grants them 6 armor, 50 attack speed, and 10% movement speed. When cast on an enemy, removes 6 armor, 50 attack speed, and 10% movement speed.Removes the armor from the caster when used.  Cannot target spell immune enemies.Range: 1000
solar_crest.lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

hint: Use: Disguise Turns the caster and all allied player-controlled units in a 1200 radius invisible, and grants 15% bonus movement speed for 35 seconds. Attacking, or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility. Disguise grants invisibility that is immune to True Sight.
smoke_of_deceit.lore: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

hint: Use: EnlightenGrants you 700 experience plus 135 per tome consumed by your team after the first two.
tome_of_knowledge.lore: That which raises beast to man and man to god.

hint: Active: Magic Weakness Cast a 600 radius blast that causes enemy heroes to take 18% increased damage from spells.Range: 1200Duration: 16 seconds.
Passive: Basilius AuraGrants 1.75 mana regeneration to allies.  Radius: 1200

Active: Phantom ProvinceYour next %number_of_attacks% attacks have True Strike and deal magic damage. Expires after %active_duration% seconds. Can attack Ethereal units and deals no damage to Magic Immune targets.

Passive: Witch Blade Causes your next attack to apply a poison for %slow_duration% seconds, slowing by %slow%%% and dealing %int_damage_multiplier%x your intelligence as damage every second. Can only trigger once every %passive_cooldown% seconds.
revenants_brooch.lore: The cursed brooch of a fallen guardian who stalks forever between the veil of life and death.

hint: Active: MendRestores 300 health and 200 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.Radius: 1200Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Passive: Guardian Aura Grants 2.5 health regeneration and 3 armor to allied units. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, this is increased to 18.5 health regeneration and 10 armor. Radius: 1200
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
guardian_greaves.notes: The aura boost only applies to heroes.
guardian_greaves.lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

hint: Active: CrippleRoots the target for 2 seconds.Range: 1100
rod_of_atos.lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

hint: Active: ChopTargets a non-player enemy unit to remove 40% of its current HP.If cast on a tree, instantly destroys it.Unit Range: 350Tree Range: 350
iron_talon.notes: Has a 4 second cooldown on Trees.
iron_talon.lore: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.

hint: Active: Overwhelm Stuns a target enemy unit for 2 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity.Range: 150
Passive: Bash Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.5 seconds and deal 120 bonus physical damage.  Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.
Passive: Damage Block Grants a 60% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.
abyssal_blade.notes:
The stun is melee range.
Does not stack with other bashes.
Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
abyssal_blade.lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

hint: Active: DisarmPrevents a target from attacking for 3 seconds on melee targets, and 5 seconds on ranged targets.Range: 600
heavens_halberd.lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

hint: Passive: Aquila AuraGrants %aura_mana_regen% mana regeneration and %aura_bonus_armor% armor to nearby allies.Radius: %aura_radius%
Toggle: Aura Deactivate to stop affecting non-hero units.
ring_of_aquila.notes: Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.
ring_of_aquila.lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

hint: Passive: Break Whenever you attack a hero or are attacked by any unit, the bonus 14 HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to 40 for 13 seconds.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
tranquil_boots.lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

hint: Active: FadeGrants invisibility to you or a target allied hero as long as the target unit remains still.  Has a 1.25 second fade time, and breaks instantly upon moving. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.Range: 600
shadow_amulet.lore: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

hint: Active: Glimmer After a 0.6 second delay, grants invisibility and 50% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for 5 seconds.Range: 550Can be cast while channelling.
glimmer_cape.lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

hint: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into liquid chrome for 900 seconds. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

Active: Blink Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.
super_blink.lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

keen_optic.lore: Stolen from a tinker's shop ages ago, this handy lens has seen service to many owners.

hint: Passive: Magic Amp Reduces magic resistance of the attacked enemy by %magic_resistance_reduction%%%.
grove_bow.lore: A gift from the moon goddess to one of her prized disciples many memories ago.

hint: Passive: Cooldown ReductionReduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by %bonus_cooldown%%%
quickening_charm.lore: An evergreen amulet of druidic origins.

philosophers_stone.lore: A weightless charm created by an enchanter with a powerful scorn for brute force.

hint: Active: ForceDispels the user and pushes them 750 units in the direction they are facing.
Passive: Speed Unlock Completely removes the speed limit for the wearer
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
force_boots.lore: Elusive marvels never successfully studied for proper classification in the archives.

hint: Passive: Greater Corruption Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -10 for 7 seconds.
desolator_2.lore: The original demonic favorite that served as basis for the beloved mortal design.

hint: Passive: RebirthLethal damage is prevented and instead the wearer is healed to half health and non-ultimate ability cooldowns reset. Gets consumed on trigger.
Active: Reveal Reveal a target 800 area of the map for 6 seconds.
seer_stone.lore: The curious creation of a wizard who professed to hail from another time.

hint: Consume Unbelievably Good MangoOverwhelms your hero, causing you to die. However, when you respawn, you will have all talents on both sides skilled.
Use: Consume Restores 500 health and 250 mana to the target over 6 seconds.If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.Range: 250
Active: Mega Shield Force Field Aura Grants %active_reflection_pct%%% Damage Reflection for 5 seconds.
Passive: Shield Grants +%bonus_aoe_armor% armor and +%bonus_aoe_mres%%% Magic Resistance to all other allies within %bonus_aoe_radius% radius.
force_field.lore: An exquisite piece commissioned by a paranoid monarch who choked on a piece of fruit long before the item saw its intended use.

hint: Passive: Hair Trigger The next time you get attacked by a hero within %radius% range, explode dealing %damage% damage to all enemies within a %radius% radius and causing them to miss %blind_pct%%% of their attacks for %blind_duration% seconds.
black_powder_bag.lore: One of a set of custom rigs once worn by infamous road agents in the Outlands, its siblings have been lost to misfires and the various tides of time.

hint: Increases the wearer's armor, while reducing their attack speed.
Use: Imbue Instantly restores 250 health.
Increases all outgoing spell damage and debuff duration.
timeless_relic.lore: An unmarred discovery from the excavated ruins of an ancient wizard's academy.

hint: Passive: Echo Shield Block and reflect most targeted spells back to their caster once every 8 seconds.
mirror_shield.lore: The shield that long ago robbed the old one of his first memories.

hint: Use: Plant Tree Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.Range: 800
ironwood_tree.lore: Precious. And hearty as a weed.

hint: Use: Plant a Mango Tree Targets the ground to plant a mango tree that provides unlimited mango power. The tree generates Enchanted Mangoes every 60 seconds, and provides unobstructed vision in the area Range: 200
Use: Consume Grants a target allied unit a permanent buff that provides +2.25 Health Regen and +1.25 Mana Regen.Does not stack on the same unit.
royal_jelly.lore: To those who harvest olgru jelly, success serves more than mere profit--it's often the means to survival--for only the jelly itself can cure the ravages that follow a sting from the vigilant denizens of the giant hives.

hint: Increases both non-primary attributes.
pupils_gift.lore: An astounding plate of ever-replenishing, fortifying fruit.

hint: Use: Consume Temporarily grants an allied target the Aghanim's Scepter buff for 3 minutes.
Use: Building Repair Targets a building, restoring 40% of it's health over 30 seconds. Also grants +10 armor during this period. Range: 600
Passive: Silence Strike The next attack silences the hit enemy for 1.75 seconds.
mind_breaker.lore: A bewitching blade of indeterminate form capable of piercing the psyche of even the most willful foe.

hint: Passive: True Sight Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 500 range of its carrier.
Passive: Charge LossLoses a charge on death. After all charges are lost, the item disappears.
Passive: Cooldown ReductionReduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by %bonus_cooldown%%%.
spell_prism.lore: Even the slightest flaw in the components of a spell prism can result in the death of its user.

hint: Passive: Hex Strike The next attack hexes the hit enemy into a frog for 1.5 seconds.
Increases the wearer's max health, while reducing their max mana.
Passive: Critical Strike Empowers your next attack, causing it to be a critical strike dealing 130% damage.
imp_claw.lore: Though their tasks are largely thankless, demon hunters can often turn a profit bartering parts in Weeping Rose.

hint: Active: Flicker Dispells debuffs and blinks you in a random forward direction for a random distance between 200 and 600. If cast within 3 seconds of receving player damage, it will blink in place.
flicker.lore: The technically-true-to-his-word 'teleportation device' crafted by a notorious fae trickster.

hint: Passive: Prescient Aura Lowers Scan cooldown by %scan_cooldown_reduction%%% . Increases attack and cast range of allies in a %aura_range% unit radius.
spy_gadget.lore: A handy tool that manages to make close what once was far.

hint: Active: Skitter Grants you %bonus_movement_speed_active%%% bonus movement speed and free pathing for %duration% seconds. Walking over trees causes them to be destroyed.
spider_legs.lore: A horrifying yet useful mixture of necromancy and artificing.

hint: Passive: Death Delay Survive for an extra 5 seconds after receiving a killing blow.
Also provides one of the following, based on the Vambrace's main attribute:
Strength: +10% Magic Resistance
Agility: +10 Attack Speed
Intelligence: +6% Spell Amp
vambrace.lore: The coveted treasure that divided the heirs of Queen Raiya upon her death, resulting in the eventual downfall of her kingdom.

hint: Active: Blink Strike Targets a unit to teleport to them. Knocks enemies back 250 distance and disables them for 1 second. Range: 1600
Use: Consume Grants the target the bonuses of every Power Rune for 50 seconds. Each use consumes a charge.
Passive: Water Regen Provides you with 10 HP regen and 5 mana regen while in the river.
ocean_heart.lore: A charm blessed by the Council of the Brine.

broom_handle.lore: The surprisingly dangerous creation of an apprentice sorcerer with a strange fondness for brooms.

hint: Active: Dig Channel for %abilitychanneltime% second. Can find a Bounty Rune, a Flask, an Enchanted Mango, or an enemy Kobold.
trusty_shovel.lore: Former plaything of a young deity, received as a gift from his uncle.

nether_shawl.lore: An otherworldly garment tethered to our plane by unknown means.

hint: Passive: Afterburn Causes attacks to burn the enemy, dealing 18 damage per second for 3 seconds. Affects buildings.
dragon_scale.lore: The remains of a dragon always outvalue the wealth of even the most prodigious hoard.

hint: Active: Life Essence Increases your current and max health by %health_gain% for %health_gain_duration% seconds.
essence_ring.lore: An ancient bauble blessed by the breath of Verodicia.

hint: Active: Ensnare Ensnares the target enemy and yourself for 1.75 seconds. Range: 600
Passive: Certain Strike Empowers your next attack with %bonus_damage% bonus magical damage and True Strike. Ranged Attackers have +%bonus_attack_range% bonus range for the attack.
enchanted_quiver.lore: A graceful gift blessed by the goddess of the hunt.

hint: Active: Solitary Disguise Casts Smoke of Deceit on yourself only.
ninja_gear.lore: Valuable equipment recovered by a young explorer sifting through the flotsam and detritus drifting in the void.

hint: Active: Create Illusion Creates an image under your control.
Passive: Illusion MasteryIncreases outgoing damage of all units and illusions controlled by the hero by 6%.
illusionsts_cape.lore: A dashing cape whose creator insists on calling 'Cloak of Apparition' as opposed to his assistant's 'Illusion' drivel.

hint: Active: Havoc Knocks back enemies in 400 range around you, slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 + 1x your str as magical damage.
Passive: Rejuvenate  When the wearer's health falls below 20%, they will receive a hard dispel and be healed for 300 health.

apex.lore: Three orbs of remarkable power bound within a single scepter.

hint: Passive: Knockback Knocks back enemies 50 distance and deals 50 pure damage with every attack.
ballista.lore: A simple design much improved by a master smith's loving hand.

hint: Active: Woodland Stride Create a path of trees behind you for 3 seconds. Trees last up to 15 seconds.
Passive: Tree Walking Removes movement speed limit and allows free pathing through trees.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Active: Greater Demonic Summoning Summon 2 sets of Level 3 Necronomicon Units that last 75 seconds. Units have 100% more health and 75% more damage.
demonicon.lore: A record of the final reckoning. With one page torn out.

hint: Active: Fallen Sky Transform into a meteor that strikes down at the target area after %land_time% seconds in a %impact_radius% AoE, stunning enemies for %stun_duration% seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage every %burn_interval% seconds to enemy units and buildings for %burn_duration% seconds.Building Impact Damage: %impact_damage_buildings% Building Over Time Damage: %burn_dps_buildings% Non-Building Impact Damage: %impact_damage_units% Non-Building Over Time Damage: %burn_dps_units% Range: %abilitycastrange%
fallen_sky.lore: One of the few surviving creations of the acolytes of the Wyrmforge.

hint: Active: Dig Channel for %abilitychanneltime% second. Always finds a Bounty Rune!
pirate_hat.lore: A salty skulltopper cursed with endless good fortune.

hint: Active Teleport instantly anywhere on the map.
Active: Reset Cooldowns Reset the cooldown on all items (except Refresher Orb).
ex_machina.lore: The remains of an ancient universe, preserved within a single sphere.

faded_broach.lore: A life-saving jewel bestowed upon a young queen by a kindly vizier.

hint: Passive: Greater Healing Amplifies the wearer's Regeneration, Healing, Lifesteal and Spell Lifesteal by %bonus_amp%%%.
paladin_sword.lore: The sigil blade of the legendary Brother Yhols of Gausra, stripped from its scabbard on the day of his controversial excommunication.

hint: Active: Lesser Avatar Grants Spell Immunity for 2 seconds.
minotaur_horn.lore: The trophy from a mighty beast ambushed and slain in the recesses of its own home.

hint: Passive: Impeding Corruption Attacks reduce the target's armor and movement speed. Slow amount varies based on whether the wearer is melee or ranged.
orb_of_destruction.lore: An ingot of chaos suspended in wizard's ether, housed within an arcanist's orb.

the_leveller.lore: A demonic blade that struck the final blow to crack the gates of the Sanctum of Solanas.

hint: Active: Replenish Mana Restores %mana_restore% mana to all nearby allies.  Radius: %radius%
arcane_ring.lore: Once a prized heirloom of a minor lord's house.

titan_sliver.lore: Though many desire this brilliant shard for its obvious qualities, a school of study exists to determine the true size and purpose of its incomprehensible whole.

hint: PassiveEverytime you are attacked, you return 30 damage to heroes and 20 damage to creeps.
chipped_vest.lore: It doesn't look like much, but it's oddly comfy.

hint: ActiveDeals 125 damage to up to 2 random enemy units within 700.
Reduces TP cooldown by 20 seconds and causes TP scrolls to not be consumed.

elven_tunic.lore: Even simple items of elven make seem imbued with inexplicable efficacy.

hint: Passive: ImmolateBurns enemy units for 45 damage per second. Illusions deal 30 damage per second.Radius: 375
cloak_of_flames.lore: A very fine cloak that plays host to an overly-protective living flame.

hint: Active: CloakCauses you to become invisible for 6 seconds.
trickster_cloak.lore: A fantastic garment immediately misplaced by its creator upon completion.

hint: Upon taking hero damage, you gains 18 damage, 5 armor, 15 for 7 seconds.
Passive: LifestealHeals the attacker for 7 HP on each attack.
possessed_mask.lore: Even when discarded with specific purpose and great care, this frightening mask always finds its way onto the face of a new owner.

hint: Passive: Cleave Melee heroes deal 20% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to 650 around the target.
Passive: MaimEach attack has a 25% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by 20% and attack speed by 60 for 3 seconds.
penta_edged_sword.lore: The final, twisted work of a severely pious blacksmith, completed immediately before the taking of his own life.

hint: Active: RejuvenateTarget an allied hero and restore 480 health over 12 seconds.If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.
Active: WarhammerDeals 75 damage and reduces the target's armor by 3 for 6 seconds.
Active: WhipGrants 18% movement speed when cast on allies, and slows by 18% when cast on enemies. Lasts 4 seconds.
bullwhip.lore: Once the favored lash of an infamous broker of pit fighters and other live trade.

hint: Active: Psychic PushPushes the target enemy unit away from you %push_length% distance.
psychic_headband.lore: A failed experiment in finer telekinetic control, still fit for other ends.

hint: Passive: Ceremonial AuraLowers enemy Status Resistance by %status_resistance%%% and Magic Resistance by %magic_resistance%%%.Radius: %aura_radius%
ceremonial_robe.lore: One of many items lost in the looting of Zelenwyr's sacred reliquary.

hint: Passive: QuicksilverGrants you a bonus %bonus_movement%%% movement speed and %bonus_attack% attack speed anytime one of your abilities are on cooldown.
quicksilver_amulet.lore: An enchanted talisman brimming with a mysterious substance.

hint: Active: ShadowsTarget an enemy, ally or self. Causes the target to become untargetable but also silenced, muted and disarmed for 3 seconds. Applies a Basic Dispel.
book_of_shadows.lore: An impossible tome filled with unreadable prose of unknowable thoughts.

hint: Passive: Giant's FootCan path over any terrain and deals 100% of your strength per second to units you are standing ontop of.
giants_ring.lore: Prized procurement of an otherwise unremarkable ruler of Elze who abdicated his position and vanished.

hint: Passive: Vengeance's ShadowUpon death, you spawn a strong-illusion that deals 100% damage and takes 150% damage. Can cast all basic spells. Illusion casts 30 seconds.
Active: Whirlwind Cyclones your hero for 0.75 seconds.
Passive: Bottled Lightning Zaps an enemy within 700 range, dealing 200 damage and a 40% slow for 0.3 seconds. Strikes every 3 seconds.
stormcrafter.lore: The accidental byproduct of a spell conjured to entrap a lesser god.

hint: Restores 500 health, and 200 mana over 4 seconds. Can capture runes.

mysterious_hat.lore: A small token imbued with the fortune of the fae in recognition of an intriguing display of mortal kindness.

hint: Passive: EnduranceWhenever a debuff would be applied to the owner, grant %status_resistance%%% Status resistance for %duration% seconds.
ascetic_cap.lore: An austere hat thought to be of Turstarkuri origin.

hint: Passive: Dark MercyYour attacks deal %bonus_damage% more damage to enemies for each %missing_hp%%% HP they are missing.
misericorde.lore: An infamous assassin's blade stolen and smuggled out of White Spire after its owner's mysterious demise.

hint: Active: CleansePurge Target Enemy or Ally.
Passive: SubjugateYour attacks deal bonus damage equal to 4% of your target Max Mana.
heavy_blade.lore: With ready access to test subjects, untold cruelties have been dreamed up and loosed upon the world from within the walls of the Tyler Estate.

hint: Active: Pig, Out!Turns your hero into a critter for 4 seconds and gives them +10% Movement Speed.
unstable_wand.lore: A makeshift charm misplaced by a peace-loving, addlebrained enchanter.

hint: Active: VaultPropels your hero forward %leap_distance% units. Tumbler's Toy gets disabled for 3 seconds if its owner receives damage from a player source.
pogo_stick.lore: An antique plaything found in the ruins of an Ozenja circus bazaar.

hint: Active: Shadow BrandThrows a Mark towards an enemy within %abilitycastrange% range applying a debuff that deals %dps% damage every second and provides vision of the unit for %duration% seconds.
paintball.lore: Those marked for death by the fae shine brightly to all manner of creatures in the shadow realm.

diffusal_blade_2.desc:
Active: Purge Targets an enemy, removing buffs from the target and slowing it for 4 seconds.Range: 600
Passive: ManabreakEach attack burns 50 mana from the target, and deals 0.8 physical damage per burned mana. Burns 16 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
diffusal_blade_2.notes: Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.
diffusal_blade_2.lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
